features: Exceptional Performance with Cutting-Edge Technology:The REDMAGIC gaming phone is powered by the industry-leading Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, clocking speeds of up to 4.32 GHz. Combined with up to 16GB LPDDR5X Ultra RAM and 512GB UFS 4.1 Pro storage, it achieves a 45% performance boost. The device is optimized for seamless multitasking and gaming, setting a new standard for gaming smartphones.

Revolutionary Display Technology: Featuring a 6.85-inch BOE AMOLED screen with 1.5K resolution (2,688 x 1,216 pixels), 144Hz refresh rate, and peak brightness of 2,000 nits, the display ensures unmatched clarity and energy efficiency. With ultra-narrow bezels and a 95.3% screen-to-body ratio, this smartphone offers an edge-to-edge visual experience, ideal for gamers and entertainment enthusiasts alike.

Innovative Cooling System for Optimal Performance: This gaming cellphone incorporates the ICE-X Cooling System, which leverages liquid metal technology for superior thermal conductivity of 80 W/mK. Its 11-layer structure, including graphene insulation, aerospace-grade aluminum, and a high-speed 23,000 RPM turbofan with RGB lighting, ensures efficient heat dissipation and peak performance during demanding tasks.

Advanced Battery Technology and Charging Efficiency: Equipped with a 7,050 mAh battery and 100W fast charging, the REDMAGIC gaming phone offers up to 52 hours of usage. Enhanced by Qualcomm Quick Charge 5 and a charge separation mode, it minimizes heat during active use and ensures safe operation in extreme conditions, providing unmatched reliability among smartphones.

Integrated AI Capabilities and Enhanced Usability: Google Gemini AI empowers the cellphone with intelligent features like real-time translation, advanced photo editing, and AI-assisted music generation. These innovations streamline multitasking and enhance productivity, making this gaming smartphone a powerful tool for creativity and daily tasks.

description: Overview This intelligent gimbal is lightweight and compact. Simply unfold to start filming smooth dynamic footage. With the built-in extension rod, you can include more friends in the photo and take the perfect selfie. A whole host of intelligent features are at your fingertips, including ShotGuides to help capture the scenario you're in or creative features like Timelapse. Use the DJI Mimo to add the final touches to your content and share. DJI Osmo Mobile 6 is the ultimate creative tool to elevate your creations on the go.  Features A new status display panel: Check how much battery you have left, system indicator status, or which gimbal mode you're in. The M button makes it easy to switch between different modes and get unique with your shots.  Flip between horizontal and vertical: It's as effortless as double-clicking the switch button to go from horizontal to vertical shooting.  Notes 1. Auto pop-ups on the DJI Mimo app are only supported on iPhone and are subject to actual circumstances. When using DJI Osmo Mobile 6 for the first time, enable Quick Launch in the DJI Mimo app and follow the instructions to complete authorization.  2. Tested when following a single subject.  3. LightCut is a smartphone editing app recommended by DJI. 4. Currently, only Apple Watch is supported (Apple Watch Series 7/8/9, Apple Watch SE 2, Apple Watch Ultra 1/2, with an operating system of watchOS 9 or later).* Due to platform compatibility issue, the DJI Mimo app has been removed from Google Play. You cannot search for DJI Mimo in Google Play. To ensure a better product usage experience, please log in to the DJI official website to download the latest version of DJI Mimo.
features: Stay on Point with ActiveTrack 6.0 - With upgraded tracking tech, OM 6 sticks to your energetic kids or playful pets like glue. You can even make it track yourself. Become the star of your own film without needing anyone's help.

Remote Control With Watch - Install the DJI Mimo app on your Apple Watch, and turn it into a smart remote for Osmo Mobile 6. Remotely view camera feeds, adjust the gimbal's angle, and capture photos and record videos all from your watch.

Silky Smooth Shots with 3-Axis Stabilization - You know what ruins videos? Shaky footage. DJI OM 6 is here to help. This phone gimbal ensures super steady shots, even when you're on the move. Say hello to buttery-smooth videos.

So quick, So easy - This smartphone stabilizer powers on as soon as you unfold it. Just attach your phone, and you are ready to shoot. Catch that breathtaking sunset or your child's smile without missing a beat.

Lightweight, Compact, and Extendable - With a foldable design and weighing only 305g, this cell phone gimbal stabilizer is easy to take anywhere. Extend the built-in extension rod to get creative angles or the perfect selfie.

Shoot Like a Pro, Even If You're a Newbie - OM 6's ShotGuides recognizes your scene and suggests a shot sequence. From romantic outings to picnics, follow the steps to easily create stunning films, even if it's your first time.

Use Side Wheel to Get Cinematic Effects - The side wheel gives you power over focus and zoom. Nail that cinematic blur or try a Hitchcock zoom for some dramatic flair. Up your video game and impress your friends with high-quality videos.

The gimbal is stain resistant and coated in a non-slip texture, with an ergonomic grip that will keep it secure in your hands. It's compatible with most iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, and Huawei series. Please check the compatibility list before purchasing.
New Parents and Kids Mode - Capture and record heartwarming moments with your child as the gimbal autonomously shoots and records, allowing parents to be present in the frame.

Due to platform compatibility issue, the DJI Mimo app has been removed from Google Play. You cannot search for DJI Mimo in Google Play. To ensure a better product usage experience, please log in to the DJI official website to download the latest version of DJI Mimo.

title: KardiaMobile 6-Lead Personal EKG Monitor – Six Views of The Heart – Detects AFib and Irregular Arrhythmias – Instant Results in 30 Seconds – Works with Most Smartphones - FSA/HSA Eligible
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Fitness Technology › Heart Rate Monitors
features: ACCURATE AND DETAILED EKG RESULTS. KardiaMobile 6L records a medical-grade, six-lead EKG and provides FDA-cleared determinations of your heart rhythm in just 30 seconds.

SIX LEADS, SIX TIMES THE DATA. Six-lead EKGs give you a more detailed view of your heart and more data to share with your doctor. With KardiaMobile 6L, you can detect AFib, Bradycardia, Tachycardia and Normal Sinus Rhythm right on your smartphone. KardiaMobile 6L does not check for heart attack.
TRUSTED BY PROFESSIONALS: Recommended by doctors, KardiaMobile 6L is the world’s only FDA-cleared six-lead personal EKG

COMPATIBLE WITH SMARTPHONES. Works with most smartphones and tablets. KardiaMobile 6L is compatible with most popular phones and tablets. To use your Kardia device, you must download the Kardia app on a compatible device. Visit alivecor.com/compatibility to check the list of compatible devices.
NO SUBSCRIPTION REQUIRED. Takes a six-lead EKG and detects Atrial Fibrillation, Bradycardia, Tachycardia, and Normal Sinus Rhythm without a KardiaCare subscription.

attributes.key: Item Package Dimensions L x W x H

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
KardiaMobile 6L 
More in depth heart data than any smartwatch. 
Record six-lead EKGs in seconds with KardiaMobile 6L, the most advanced handheld EKG outside the hospital. While common smartwatches only record a single-lead EKG, KardiaMobile 6L is the world’s first FDA-cleared personal EKG device that records six-lead EKGs. The more leads recorded, the more detailed view of your heart rhythm. Because when it comes to your heart, you deserve peace of mind. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Previous page
World’s first six-lead personal EKG 
KardiaMobile 6L is the world’s only FDA-cleared, six-lead personal EKG that fits in your pocket, allowing you to record more heart data and get a sophisticated, detailed view of your heart anywhere. 
Learn More 
Six leads, six times the data 
Accurately record leads I, II, III, aVL, aVR, and aVF. Six-lead EKGs give you and your doctor more heart data to help inform care plan decisions. 
Heart data you can trust 
KardiaMobile 6L is clinically validated and FDA-cleared, making it one of the most reliable ways to check in on your heart from home. 
Accurate and easy to use 
KardiaMobile 6L has two electrodes on the top for your fingers or thumbs and one on the bottom to contact the skin of your left leg. No wires, patches, or gels required. 
Next page
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
What Makes Kardia Different? 
Kardia devices can detect up to six of the most common arrhythmias. 
Kardia technology is the most clinically validated personal EKG technology in the world. 
Kardia connects you with board-certified cardiologists from home—no appointment required. 
Join KardiaCare unlock exclusive features in the Kardia app. (membership not required) 
What conditions/arrhythmias can KardiaMobile 6L detect? 
KardiaMobile 6L detects AFib, Bradycardia, Tachycardia, and Normal Sinus Rhythm. More arrhythmia detections are available with a KardiaCare membership. Visit kardia.com to learn more about our one-of-a-kind heart health membership. 
Is a subscription required? 
Take unlimited EKGs with results in 30 seconds, store your EKGs on your phone, email your EKG to your doctor or a loved one, and more--all with no subscription required. 
Do Kardia products work with a pacemaker? 
We do not recommend the use of Kardia products for patients with pacemakers, ICDs, or other implanted electronic devices as we cannot validate the accuracy of the EKGs. 
Can I share the EKGs with my doctor? 
You are able to print and/or share your EKGs with your doctor via email. Visit the support page on our website to learn more. 
What battery is used in the KardiaMobile 6L? 
The KardiaMobile 6L uses a CR2016 Coin Cell that is IEC 60086-4 compliant.

title: KardiaMobile 1-Lead Personal EKG Monitor – Record at Home – Detects AFib & Irregular Arrhythmias – Easy Results in 30 Seconds – Works w/Most Smartphones - FSA/HSA Eligible
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors›Exercise & Fitness›Fitness Technology›Heart Rate Monitors
features: KardiaMobile is a smart device that can record a medical-grade electrocardiogram (EKG) right on your smartphone. EKGs measure the electrical activity of your heart and are used in hospitals to detect irregularities with your heart rate or rhythm, which may be indicators of a heart condition such as atrial fibrillation (AFib). KardiaMobile records a single-lead EKG, which provides you and your doctor with reliable information on your heart health.

EKG ON THE GO: Capture unlimited medical-grade EKGs in 30 seconds and get an instant analysis right on your smartphone. KardiaMobile is small enough to fit in your pocket, so you can take it with you anywhere.

EASY TO USE: Simply place your fingers on the sensors to detect Atrial Fibrillation, Bradycardia, Tachycardia and Normal Sinus Rhythm. Additional detections and features available with KardiaCare subscription. KardiaCare is not included with this product.
TRUSTED BY PROFESSIONALS: KardiaMobile is FDA-cleared and the #1 doctor-recommended personal EKG with more than 100 million EKGs recorded.
EKG HISTORY: With the press of a button, email your EKGs to your doctor or save them on your phone, no subscription required.

KardiaMobile is COMPATIBLE WITH MOST POPULAR PHONES and TABLETS. To use your Kardia device, you must download the Kardia app on a compatible device. Visit alivecor.com/compatibility to check the list of compatible devices.
NO SUBSCRIPTION REQUIRED. Detects Atrial Fibrillation, Bradycardia, Tachycardia, and Normal Sinus Rhythm without a KardiaCare subscription.
Instructions for use, tutorials, troubleshooting, and additional product support is offered through the product's Kardia app.
Not recommended for use with pacemakers and ICDs and does not detect heart attack.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
KardiaMobile 
A smart device you can trust 
KardiaMobile records a medical-grade, single-lead EKG right on your phone or tablet. As one of the most widely used personal EKGs in the world, KardiaMobile is highly recommended by leading cardiologists. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Previous page
Convenient and reliable 
Record an EKG in seconds and get an FDA-cleared instant analysis letting you know if your heart rhythm is normal or if you’re experiencing an arrhythmia (irregular heart rhythm). 
Learn More 
Heart data you can trust 
KardiaMobile is doctor-recommended, clinically validated, and FDA-cleared, making it one of the most reliable ways to check in on your heart from home. 
Saves your EKG results to your phone 
Your EKG results history will be automatically stored on your smartphone for easy access. Review your results at any time and email them to your doctor with ease. 
Next page
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
What Makes Kardia Different? 
Kardia devices can detect up to six of the most common arrhythmias. 
Kardia technology is the most clinically validated personal EKG technology in the world. 
Kardia connects you with board-certified cardiologists from home—no appointment required. 
Join KardiaCare unlock exclusive features in the Kardia app. (membership not required) 
What conditions/arrhythmias can KardiaMobile detect? 
KardiaMobile detects AFib, Bradycardia, Tachycardia, and Normal Sinus Rhythm. More arrhythmia detections are available with a KardiaCare membership. Visit kardia.com to learn more about our one-of-a-kind heart health membership. 
Is a subscription required? 
Take unlimited EKGs with results in 30 seconds, store your EKGs on your phone, email your EKG to your doctor or a loved one, and more--all with no subscription required. 
Do Kardia products work with a pacemaker? 
We do not recommend the use of Kardia products for patients with pacemakers, ICDs, or other implanted electronic devices as we cannot validate the accuracy of the EKGs. 
Can I share the EKGs with my doctor? 
You are able to print and/or share your EKGs with your doctor via email. Visit the support page on our website to learn more. 
What battery is used in the KardiaMobile? 
The KardiaMobile uses a CR2016 Coin Cell. Detailed steps to replace a battery can be found on the support page on our website.

items.name: What conditions/arrhythmias can KardiaMobile detect?
items.text: KardiaMobile detects AFib, Bradycardia, Tachycardia, and Normal Sinus Rhythm. More arrhythmia detections are available with a KardiaCare membership. Visit kardia.com to learn more about our one-of-a-kind heart health membership.

items.name: Is a subscription required?
items.text: Take unlimited EKGs with results in 30 seconds, store your EKGs on your phone, email your EKG to your doctor or a loved one, and more--all with no subscription required.

items.name: Do Kardia products work with a pacemaker?
items.text: We do not recommend the use of Kardia products for patients with pacemakers, ICDs, or other implanted electronic devices as we cannot validate the accuracy of the EKGs.

items.name: Can I share the EKGs with my doctor?
items.text: You are able to print and/or share your EKGs with your doctor via email. Visit the support page on our website to learn more.

items.name: What battery is used in the KardiaMobile?
items.text: The KardiaMobile uses a CR2016 Coin Cell. Detailed steps to replace a battery can be found on the support page on our website.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the product easy to use and convenient. They say it works well, is simple to set up, and provides basic information about heart rate and blood pressure. Many customers find it useful for monitoring their pulse and keeping track of symptoms. The device is remarkably accurate and consistently reads the data. While some customers appreciate its life-saving capabilities, others have differing views on its value and quality.

title: nubia Z70 Ultra 5g Android Cellphone - Snapdragon 8 Elite Smartphone with Triple Cameras, UDC Tech, Unlocked Phone with 144Hz 6.85" AMOLED Screen, 6150mAh, 80W Fast Charging, IP68&IP69 Waterproof
inStockText: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Expansive Full Screen】Discover a stunning 6.85-inch AMOLED display that boasts a 144Hz refresh rate and peaks at a dazzling 2,000 nits, providing users with crystal-clear visuals and vibrant colors. Meanwhile, designed with an ultra-thin bezel, this display features an innovative UDC (Under Display Camera) for an uninterrupted, immersive view. Experience an ultra-responsive performance whether you’re gaming, streaming, or multitasking—no distractions, just pure visual power.

【Capture Your Vision】The nubia Z70 Ultra cellphone is the world’s first smartphone camera equipped with a 35mm Adjustable Physical Aperture. Featuring a 50MP main camera with a variable aperture, a 64MP periscope lens for zooming in, and a 50MP ultrawide lens for those epic group shots, this 5g smartphone enables you to snag the perfect shot every time, whether it's a breathtaking landscape or a candid moment.

【Pristine Power Unleashed】Fueled by the cutting-edge Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, nubia Z70 Ultra Android phone allows you to multitask effortlessly and browse at lightning speeds. Made out of silicon carbon anode, this powerhouse of a battery promises uninterrupted use with a robust 6150mAh. When it’s time to recharge, 80W fast charging gets you back up to speed instantly. Whether you're streaming videos or gaming on the go, the battery capacity ensures there are no limits.

【Meet Nebula AIOS】Effortlessly Intuitive, meet Nebula AIOS—the intelligent system that adapts to you. Built to streamline your day, its intuitive features simplify tasks and boost productivity. With a user-friendly design, this AI-power system keeps you one step ahead. Explore the funny AI functions, including Voice Assistant, AI Gallery Search, AI Translate, AI Portrait Highlights, a Bokeh effect for photos, and more.

【Tackle Any Adventure】This 1.3 mm edges slim, elegant, and stunningly crafted nubia Z70 Ultra unlocked cellphone is equipped with an IP68 rating and an improved IP69 rating. Completely water and dust-proof, it is resistant to high temperatures and high-pressure water. Rain or shine, enjoy your day thanks to a robust build and carefully crafted exterior.

【Unlocked For All Carriers】Please Confirm Your SIM Card's frequency bands are included in the below-supported Bands before Ordering. title: DOOGEE Blade10 Power Rugged Smartphone Unlocked,24GB+256GB/2TB, 10300mAh Rugged Phone, 6.6''HD+90Hz Android 14 Cell Phone, 50MP Camera, 3 Card Slots/Face Unlock/Fingerprint/NFC/Wi-Fi6E/IP69K
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock
features: 【𝟏𝟎𝟑𝟎𝟎𝐦𝐀𝐡 𝐋𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲】The DOOGEE Blade10 Power rugged smartphone is equipped with a massive 10300mAh battery, offering up to 25 days of standby and 72 hours of usage. Supporting 18W fast charging, this rugged phone powers up quickly, ensuring you stay connected throughout the day. As a rugged smartphone unlocked, it also includes OTG reverse charging, allowing it to act as a power source for other devices in emergencies.

【𝟐4𝐆𝐁 𝐑𝐀𝐌 + 𝟐𝟓𝟔𝐆𝐁 𝐑𝐎𝐌, 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝟐𝐓𝐁 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐀𝐧𝐝𝐫𝐨𝐢𝐝 𝟏𝟒】The Blade10 Power rugged smartphone unlocked is designed for efficiency with 24GB RAM (16GB + 8GB extended) and 256GB internal storage. For users needing extra space, storage is expandable up to 2TB via TF card. Powered by the latest Android 14 system, this rugged Android phone ensures smarter controls, enhanced security, and seamless multitasking, making it a reliable rugged phone for demanding applications while keeping your data secure.

【𝟓𝟎𝐌𝐏 𝐀𝐈 𝐌𝐚𝐢𝐧 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚】The Blade10 Power rugged phone features a 50MP AI main camera, offering HDR, Pro Mode, and Panorama for versatile photography. Whether capturing landscapes or close-ups, it delivers stunning detail and vibrant colors. The 8MP front camera ensures sharp selfies and high-quality video calls, making this rugged smartphone unlocked an excellent choice for capturing moments in any setting.

【𝟔.𝟔” 𝐇𝐃+ 𝟗𝟎𝐇𝐳 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐲】The Blade10 Power rugged smartphone boasts a 6.6” HD+ IPS screen with a smooth 90Hz refresh rate, delivering vibrant visuals and fluid interactions. Its notch-less punch design maximizes screen space, making it perfect for streaming, gaming, or work tasks. With 380 nits brightness, this rugged phone ensures excellent visibility even under direct sunlight.

【𝐑𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐌𝐈𝐋-𝐒𝐓𝐃-𝟖𝟏𝟎𝐇 & 𝐈𝐏𝟔𝟖/𝐈𝐏𝟔𝟗𝐊 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧】Built for extreme environments, the Blade10 Power rugged smartphone is IP68/IP69K certified and MIL-STD-810H compliant. It withstands drops from up to 1.5 meters, submersion in water up to 1.5 meters for 30 minutes, and protection from dust and sand. Whether on rugged terrains or harsh weather conditions, this rugged phone ensures dependable performance, making it the ultimate unlocked cell phone for outdoor professionals.

【𝐓𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐝 𝐒𝐥𝐨𝐭 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐆𝐥𝐨𝐛𝐚𝐥 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐲】The Blade10 Power rugged smartphone supports a triple card slot design, accommodating two SIM cards and one TF card for enhanced versatility. With compatibility across global networks, this unlocked rugged phone is ideal for frequent travelers and remote workers, ensuring reliable communication wherever you go.

【𝐄𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬】Offering advanced security, the Blade10 Power rugged smartphone includes side fingerprint recognition and face unlock for fast and safe access. With modern features like NFC for Google Pay, GPS for accurate navigation, and Bluetooth 5.0, this unlocked rugged phone combines rugged durability with smart connectivity to meet everyday needs.

modules.text: Meet Pixel 7 Pro, Google’s best-of-everything phone. Powered by Google Tensor G2, it’s super fast and secure, with an immersive display, amazing battery life, and the best Pixel camera yet.[17]

items.name: Super Res Zoom
items.text: Capture amazing photos at a distance with the 5x telephoto lens and up to 30x Super Res Zoom.[5]

items.name: Macro Focus
items.text: Even your tiniest subjects look extraordinary – raindrops, rose petals, or a blade of grass.

items.name: Cinematic Blur
items.text: Keep your subject in focus and blur the background for a dramatic effect.

items.name: Guided Frame
items.text: Helps people with low vision take selfies, using audio and haptics to guide a face into frame.

items.name: Real Tone
items.text: Real Tone represents the nuances of more skin tones beautifully, accurately, and authentically.

items.name: Performance
items.text: Google Tensor G2 makes Pixel faster, more efficient, and more secure.[1]

items.name: Security
items.text: The Titan M2 chip and Google Tensor security core add multiple layers of security.

items.name: Switching
items.text: Pixel makes it easy to transfer apps, photos, messages, and contacts in a few steps.[10]

items.name: Better together
items.text: Get personalized help throughout your day with Pixel phones, earbuds, and the Google Pixel Watch[19]

items.name: Thoughtful design
items.text: Pixel 7 Pro has a sleek, polished enclosure that’s made from 100% recycled aluminum.[20]

title: Celestron - NexYZ DX Kit - 3-Axis Universal Smartphone Adapter - Digiscoping Smartphone Adapter - Bluetooth Shutter Release Remote – Capture Images and Video Through Your Telescope or Spotting Scope
inStockText: In Stock  Only 2 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics›Camera & Photo›Accessories›Telescope & Microscope Accessories›Telescope Accessories›Photo Adapters
description: The NexYZ DX Kit is a great way to step into the world of astroimaging and digiscoping. This universal adapter kit provides you everything you need to capture sharp, detailed images and video. NexYZ’s patented design fits any eyepiece from 35mm to 60mm in diameter, including telescopes with 1.25-inch and 2-inch eyepieces, spotting scopes, monoculars, and binoculars. NexYZ will also attach to microscopes with the addition of the included adapter ring, which takes the usable diameter down to 25mm, the size of a standard microscope eyepiece. A strong spring and a threaded twist lock provide a secure grip on the optical instrument’s eyepiece so you can image with confidence. The universal smartphone adapter is fully adjustable to fit any device—usually with the case still on. Even larger “Pro” devices work perfectly. The secure platform stands up to the weight of these heavier devices with ease. If multiple people want to capture a shot through your optic, NexYZ’s simple spring-loaded clamps make it easy to remove one device and replace it with another in seconds. The NexYZ DX Kit is the ideal solution for star parties and group bird walks where everyone wants their own shot of the action. What makes NexYZ different from other smartphone adapters? The three-axis adjustment. Most adapters rely on you placing your phone perfectly on the platform and only offer limited adjustment in two axes. But NexYZ gives you the power to place your phone on the platform, center it over the eyepiece with the X and Y knobs, and then move up or down over the eyepiece until you have the entire field of view in your shot. And even though this adjustment is ultra-precise, it’s still quicker and easier than with other adapters. From start to finish, the process only takes about 30 seconds. If you switch phones, eyepieces, or optical instruments, you will need only slight adjustments to re-center the camera over the new eyepiece. You can also switch your image from portrait to landscape simply by turning the padded eyepiece clamp and readjusting the knobs to realign your phone with the eyepiece. The NexYZ DX Kit comes with a Bluetooth shutter release remote to capture shake-free images without disturbing the placement of your phone and telescope by pressing the on-screen button. The remote works with any Android or iOS smartphone.
features: Bluetooth Shutter Release Remote: To capture the best image, this kit also comes complete with a Bluetooth shutter release remote, which allows you to trigger the camera’s shutter on any Android or iOS smartphone without touching the device’s screen or buttons; This eliminates blurriness in your images caused by the phone or telescope shaking due to pressure from pressing the button manually; Pairing your Bluetooth remote to your smartphone for the first time takes only seconds
A complete digiscoping solution: NexYZ connects your smartphone to an eyepiece while the Bluetooth shutter release button helps you get a steady shot every time
Connect the remote shutter release to your phone via Bluetooth to take photos or start/stop video recording without unwanted vibration
Both devices work with virtually all smartphone models, including the latest devices from Apple, Samsung, and Google

From the manufacturer
NexYZ DX Kit 
Celestron has perfected the smartphone adapter with NexYZ DX kit. This universal digiscoping adapter helps you capture stunning images through your favorite optic in seconds. The secret is the unique Z-axis adjustment and Bluetooth shutter release remote. 
FEATURES AND BENEFITS 
Easy as X-Y-Z 
NexYZ patent device gives you the power to place your phone on the platform, center it precisely with the X and Y knobs, and then use the Z adjustment to move up or down until you have the perfect shot. 
Universal Smartphone Adapter 
Fits any eyepiece from 35mm to 60mm in diameter including telescopes (with most 1.25” or 2” eyepieces), spotting scopes, binoculars, monoculars, and microscopes. 
Image without the Blurriness 
Take advantage of our Bluetooth shutter release remote and eliminate the blurriness in your images without touching the device’s screen. 
Compatible Mobile Devices 
Works with all the latest devices from Apple, Samsung, and Google—usually with the case on. 
Multi-phone Solution 
NexYZ’s simple spring-loaded clamp makes it easy to switch out one device with another in seconds, making it the ideal solution for star parties and group 
bird walks. 
Durable Construction 
NexYZ stands up to rigorous field use thanks to its robust metal frame and polymer body. 
Change the Angle 
Go from portrait to landscape mode with a simple turn of the adapter’s clamp and a quick realignment of your phone with the eyepiece.

title: DOOGEE Blade 10 Max Rugged Smartphone, 6.56" HD+ 1.54" Dual Screen Rugged Phone Unlocked with 10300mAh Battery,20GB+256GB/2TB,4G Dual SIM Cellphones,Android 14/NFC/Face Unlock/Fingerprint/OTG
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock
features: 【6.56''HD Display with Customizable 1.54'' Rear Screen】Discover rugged Android phone, featuring an immersive 6.56-inch HD+ IPS notch-less display with a smooth 90Hz refresh rate for seamless browsing and vibrant visuals. The customizable 1.54-inch rear display provides quick access to essential information such as the date, time, and battery level. Personalize this secondary screen to effortlessly view key details without unlocking the main display, boosting your productivity and convenience.

【20GB RAM + 256GB ROM & T606 Octa-Core+Android 14】The DOOGEE rugged smartphone is designed for seamless multitasking with 8GB of RAM, expandable to an impressive 20GB using 12GB of virtual memory. With 256GB of internal storage, easily expandable to 2TB via TF card, you can store a vast library of videos and files without worry. Powered by the MediaTek T606 octa-core processor and the latest Android 14 operating system, rugged smartphone unlocked ensures smooth performance and enhanced app speeds, all while providing robust privacy and security features to keep your data safe.

【Powerful 10,300mAh Battery in a Lightweight Design】DOOGEE Blade10 Max rugged smartphone features a robust 10,300mAh battery engineered to withstand extreme temperatures from -40°C to 70°C, ensuring long-lasting and reliable performance. With 18W fast charging and OTG-supported reverse charging, this rugged phone reduces the need for frequent recharges. Despite its high-capacity battery, the rugged phone maintains a sleek and lightweight profile, measuring just 9mm at its thinnest point and weighing only 326g—striking the ideal balance between compact design and extended battery life.

【Fingerprint Recognition, Face Unlock & Glove Mode】The blade10max rugged cellphone combines advanced security with exceptional ease of use, featuring both side fingerprint recognition and face unlock for quick, secure access in any situation. Tailored for demanding environments, its Glove Mode enables seamless operation even while wearing gloves, ensuring convenience and accessibility wherever work or adventure may take you.

【NFC & Triple Card Slots for Maximum Flexibility】The DOOGEE rugged smartphone offers NFC support for Google Pay and access control, making everyday tasks more convenient. With 3 card slots, it accommodates 2 SIM cards and 1 TF card, enabling storage expansion up to 2TB and 4G Dual SIM functionality. Compatible with a wide range of networks, including GSM, WCDMA, TDD, and FDD bands (check local carrier compatibility before purchase), the doogee phone ensures reliable connectivity wherever you go.GSM: B2/3/5/8,WCDMA： B1/2/4/5/8,TDD:B34/38/39/40/41,FDD:B1/2/3/4/5/7/8/18/19/20/25/26/28AB/66

【50 MP AI Main Cameras & Intelligent Camera】The 2024 rugged mobile phone boasts a powerful 50MP AI main camera, equipped with intelligent photography modes such as Portrait, Night Scene, and Professional, along with automatic recognition of 12 scenes to capture every moment in striking detail. With advanced Morpho Imaging algorithms, it provides panorama, portrait, and night modes for a superior shooting experience. The powered smart camera enriches your digital interactions with features like text copying and translation, homework help, and recognition of plants and animals. The 8MP HD front camera delivers sharp, vibrant selfies, highlighting your best in every shot.

【IP68/IP69K/MIL-STD-810 Certified with Advanced GPS】Experience the ultimate in rugged durability with the military-grade phone, featuring IP68/IP69K/MIL-STD-810H certification that allows for submersion in water up to 1.5 meters for 30 minutes and can withstand drops from 1.5 meters, along with Corning Gorilla Glass for scratch resistance and advanced navigation with GPS, Glonass, Galileo, and Beidou—making military-grade smartphone the perfect companion for outdoor workers and explorers seeking a high-performance device.

The G44 exudes elegance with its uniquely texture back, effortlessly merging sporty flair with refined design. Each detail is meticulously crafted to capture attention and make a bold statement. With a perfect blend of beauty and functionality, the G44 is designed to elevate your style. 
Fingerprint Technology 
Achieve seamless entry to your smartphone with just a touch of your finger. The G44 ensures comprehensive security to all your applications and files. 
Express Yourself 
Elevate your photography with the G44 and unlock the triple camera power to capture all your unforgettable moments.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the cell phone offers good value for money. However, some have reported issues with the build quality and battery life. There are mixed opinions on speed and functionality.
